title: One Piece: The Genius of the Arlong Park Arc
author: Angelo Delos Trinos
description: Comprehensive analysis of the Arlong Park Arc, arguing it's one of One Piece's best arcs and the point where Oda comes together as a storyteller. Discusses how this arc perfected the crew battle format.
quotes: Arlong Park is well agreed by fans as one of One Piece's best arcs.
Arlong Park in the arc Oda really comes together not just as manga-ka but as a storyteller.

title: Exploring One Piece's East Blue Saga: Arlong Park Arc
author: Joshua Grose
description: Analysis of how the Arlong Park Arc demonstrates the brilliance of One Piece storytelling, emphasizing the protagonists actively seeking conflict rather than stumbling into it.
quotes: The Arlong Park Arc puts the pieces together to show how glorious this story can be.
Much of the weight and potency in the Arlong Park Arc comes from the protagonists seeking out a conflict with the Arlong Pirates instead of just stumbling into skirmishes.

title: One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Arlong Park Arc (According To IMDb)
author: Ashley Hocker
description: Ranking of the best episodes in the Arlong Park Arc based on IMDb ratings, providing episode-by-episode analysis of the arc's most impactful moments.

title: One Piece's Arlong Park Arc is Aging... Weirdly
author: Angelo Delos Trinos
description: Critical retrospective examining how the Arlong Park Arc's themes and portrayal of Fish-Men gain new context when viewed through the lens of later arcs that reveal their history of oppression.
quotes: Something about this story changes based on the context of future arcs.

title: Episode 44 Review: OnePiece Anime
author: Tayyab Ali
description: Dedicated review of Episode 44, focusing on the transition after the Arlong Park arc and the emotional moments of Nami's departure from Cocoyashi Village.
quotes: The rhythm becomes more measured, allowing protagonists to contemplate what they've been through.

title: Journey into the World of Pirates Arlong Park Arc
author: AnimeTipz
description: Comprehensive overview of the Arlong Park Arc, covering the entire narrative from beginning to end, including Nami's backstory and the crew's battle against Arlong.

title: One Piece: Arlong Park Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Detailed recap and review of the Arlong Park Arc, including summary of key events, character moments, and critical analysis of the arc's themes.

title: Nami's Tattoo in One Piece, Explained
author: CBR Staff
description: In-depth explanation of the symbolism behind Nami's tattoo change in Episode 44, detailing the meaning of the mikan and pinwheel design.

title: Nami's Tattoo Explained: Origins, Future Changes & Real Meaning
author: Screen Rant Staff
description: Comprehensive breakdown of Nami's tattoo evolution, explaining the original Arlong Pirates tattoo and the replacement with mikan and pinwheel symbolism.

title: Episode 44 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 44 containing episode details, plot summary, character appearances, production credits, and trivia.
